    • type

      public void type​(int codepoint)
      Types a single character
      Parameters:
      codepoint - the 32 bit UTF codepoint for the character TODO: Consider supporting more characters than just ascii characters

    • setFrameBufferSize

      public void setFrameBufferSize​(int width, int height)
      Sets the framebuffer to the new width and height
      Parameters:
      width - the new width of the window in pixels
      height - the new height of the window in pixels

    • pressKey

      public void pressKey​(int key, int action)
      Updates internal parameters about whether a key should currently be pressed
      Parameters:
      key - the GLFW key representation of which key on the keyboard is pressed
      action - the GLFW action of the key, is either GLFW_PRESS, GLFW_RELEASE, or GLFW_REPEAT

    • processShortcuts

      private void processShortcuts​(boolean alt, boolean shift, int key)
      Processes keyboard shortcuts
      Parameters:
      alt - boolean that is true if the alt key is pressed
      shift - boolean that is true if the shift key is pressed
      key - the GLFW int representation of which key was just pressed

    • scroll

      public void scroll​(double scrollChange)
      Performs on scroll actions
      Parameters:
      scrollChange - the amount by which the cursor was scrolled

    • click

      public void click​(long window, int button, int action)
      Processes the events that should be executed when the mouse is either clicked or released
      Parameters:
      button - the GLFW mouse button representation of which mouse button was pressed
      action - the GLFW action of the button press, either GLFW_PRESS or GLFW_RELEASE

    • moveMouse

      public void moveMouse​(long window, double xPosition, double yPosition)
      Moves the mouse to a new position
      Parameters:
      xPosition - the mouses new x position in pixels
      yPosition - the mouses new y position in pixels
